column2: We can still do much good, in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
Tales of your misdeeds are told from Ba Sing Se to the Fire Isles.
Black Frost is loose in this county
Pentapox is loose in this county.
The dark ash of Ash Breath is loose in this county.
There is an epidemic of Scorch Blight in this county.
Verminbite has struck this county, killing almost half of those infected.
This character has the dreaded Ashbreath.
Four Nations Restored spans a period of 640 years in the ATLA universe.
